Author: Sgr A*
Name: Gamepad Tweaks (for Healers)
Description:
Gamepad tweaks for ffxiv.

Include:
1. <gtoff> like casting type support
2. Gamepad Selection. which using "y/b/a/x" and Dpad "up/right/down/left" buttons to directly select party member no.1 ~ no.8 when casting monitored **single-target** actions.
